processingCommand.script:
:SET &CONN_UPDATE_PRIMARY# = "N"
:SET &CONN_UPDATE_FAILOVER# = "N"
:SET &CONN_PARAMETERS_PRIMARY# = ""
:SET &CONN_PARAMETERS_FAILOVER# = ""

:SET &DG_SWITCH_PRIMARY# = "N"
:SET &DG_SWITCH_FAILOVER# = "N"
:SET &DG_SWITCH_PARAMETERS# = ""
:SET &SWITCH_DATABASE# = "N"

:IF &APP_SWITCH# = "Y"
:  IF &DB_SWITCH# = "N"
!    CZCHO/CZSTL
:    IF &DIRECTION# = "&P_DATACENTER#_&S_DATACENTER#"
!      CZCHO
:      IF &DB_RUNNING_DC# = &P_DATACENTER#
:        SET &CONN_UPDATE_PRIMARY# = "N"
:        SET &CONN_UPDATE_FAILOVER# = "Y"
:        SET &CONN_PARAMETERS_FAILOVER# = "'&WMS_DB_VIP_PRI#' '&WMS_DB_PORT#' '&WMS_DB_SID#'"
:      ENDIF
:    ENDIF
!    CZCHO/CZSTL
:    IF &DIRECTION# = "&P_DATACENTER#_&S_DATACENTER#"
!      CZSTL
:      IF &DB_RUNNING_DC# = &S_DATACENTER#
:        SET &CONN_UPDATE_PRIMARY# = "N"
:        SET &CONN_UPDATE_FAILOVER# = "Y"
:        SET &CONN_PARAMETERS_FAILOVER# = "'&WMS_DB_DR#' '&WMS_DB_PORT#' '&WMS_DB_DR_SID#'"
:      ENDIF
:    ENDIF
!    CZSTL/CZCHO
:    IF &DIRECTION# = "&S_DATACENTER#_&P_DATACENTER#"
!      CZCHO
:      IF &DB_RUNNING_DC# = &P_DATACENTER#
:        SET &CONN_UPDATE_PRIMARY# = "Y"
:        SET &CONN_UPDATE_FAILOVER# = "N"
:        SET &CONN_PARAMETERS_PRIMARY# = "'&WMS_DB_VIP_PRI#' '&WMS_DB_PORT#' '&WMS_DB_SID#'"
:      ENDIF
:    ENDIF
!    CZSTL/CZCHO
:    IF &DIRECTION# = "&S_DATACENTER#_&P_DATACENTER#"
!      CZSTL
:      IF &DB_RUNNING_DC# = &S_DATACENTER#
:        SET &CONN_UPDATE_PRIMARY# = "Y"
:        SET &CONN_UPDATE_FAILOVER# = "N"
:        SET &CONN_PARAMETERS_PRIMARY# = "'&WMS_DB_DR#' '&WMS_DB_PORT#' '&WMS_DB_DR_SID#'"
:      ENDIF
:    ENDIF
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:IF &APP_SWITCH# = "Y"
:  IF &DB_SWITCH# = "Y"
!    CZCHO/CZSTL
:    IF &DIRECTION# = "&P_DATACENTER#_&S_DATACENTER#"
!      CZCHO
:      IF &DB_RUNNING_DC# = &P_DATACENTER#
:        SET &CONN_UPDATE_PRIMARY# = "N"
:        SET &CONN_UPDATE_FAILOVER# = "Y"
:        SET &CONN_PARAMETERS_FAILOVER# = "'&WMS_DB_DR#' '&WMS_DB_PORT#' '&WMS_DB_DR_SID#'"
:        SET &DG_SWITCH_PRIMARY# = "Y"
:        SET &DG_SWITCH_FAILOVER# = "N"
:        SET &DG_SWITCH_PARAMETERS# = "-i &WMS_DB_SID#"
:        SET &SWITCH_DATABASE# = "Y"
:      ENDIF
:    ENDIF
!    CZCHO/CZSTL
:    IF &DIRECTION# = "&P_DATACENTER#_&S_DATACENTER#"
!      CZSTL
:      IF &DB_RUNNING_DC# = &S_DATACENTER#
:        SET &CONN_UPDATE_PRIMARY# = "N"
:        SET &CONN_UPDATE_FAILOVER# = "Y"
:        SET &CONN_PARAMETERS_FAILOVER# = "'&WMS_DB_VIP_PRI#' '&WMS_DB_PORT#' '&WMS_DB_SID#'"
:      ENDIF
:    ENDIF
!    CZSTL/CZCHO
:    IF &DIRECTION# = "&S_DATACENTER#_&P_DATACENTER#"
!      CZCHO
:      IF &DB_RUNNING_DC# = &P_DATACENTER#
:        SET &CONN_UPDATE_PRIMARY# = "Y"
:        SET &CONN_UPDATE_FAILOVER# = "N"
:        SET &CONN_PARAMETERS_PRIMARY# = "'&WMS_DB_DR#' '&WMS_DB_PORT#' '&WMS_DB_DR_SID#'"
:      ENDIF
:    ENDIF
!    CZSTL/CZCHO
:    IF &DIRECTION# = "&S_DATACENTER#_&P_DATACENTER#"
!      CZSTL
:      IF &DB_RUNNING_DC# = &S_DATACENTER#
:        SET &CONN_UPDATE_PRIMARY# = "Y"
:        SET &CONN_UPDATE_FAILOVER# = "N"
:        SET &CONN_PARAMETERS_PRIMARY# = "'&WMS_DB_VIP_PRI#' '&WMS_DB_PORT#' '&WMS_DB_SID#'"
:        SET &DG_SWITCH_PRIMARY# = "N"
:        SET &DG_SWITCH_FAILOVER# = "Y"
:        SET &DG_SWITCH_PARAMETERS# = "-i &WMS_DB_DR_SID#"
:        SET &SWITCH_DATABASE# = "Y"
:      ENDIF
:    ENDIF
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:IF &APP_SWITCH# = "N"
:  IF &DB_SWITCH# = "Y"
!    CZCHO/CZSTL
:    IF &DIRECTION# = "&P_DATACENTER#_&S_DATACENTER#"
:      IF &DB_RUNNING_DC# = &P_DATACENTER#
:        SET &DG_SWITCH_PRIMARY# = "Y"
:        SET &DG_SWITCH_FAILOVER# = "N"
:        SET &DG_SWITCH_PARAMETERS# = "-i &WMS_DB_SID#"
:        SET &SWITCH_DATABASE# = "Y"
:        IF &WMS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN# = "Y"
:          SET &CONN_UPDATE_PRIMARY# = "Y"
:          SET &CONN_PARAMETERS_PRIMARY# = "'&WMS_DB_DR#' '&WMS_DB_PORT#' '&WMS_DB_DR_SID#'"
:        ENDIF
:        IF &WMS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN# = "Y"
:          SET &CONN_UPDATE_FAILOVER# = "Y"
:          SET &CONN_PARAMETERS_FAILOVER# = "'&WMS_DB_DR#' '&WMS_DB_PORT#' '&WMS_DB_DR_SID#'"
:        ENDIF
:      ENDIF
:    ENDIF
!    CZSTL/CZCHO
:    IF &DIRECTION# = "&S_DATACENTER#_&P_DATACENTER#"
:      IF &DB_RUNNING_DC# = &S_DATACENTER#
:        SET &DG_SWITCH_PRIMARY# = "N"
:        SET &DG_SWITCH_FAILOVER# = "Y"
:        SET &DG_SWITCH_PARAMETERS# = "-i &WMS_DB_DR_SID#"
:        SET &SWITCH_DATABASE# = "Y"
:        IF &WMS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN# = "Y"
:          SET &CONN_UPDATE_PRIMARY# = "Y"
:          SET &CONN_PARAMETERS_PRIMARY# = "'&WMS_DB_VIP_PRI#' '&WMS_DB_PORT#' '&WMS_DB_SID#'"
:        ENDIF
:        IF &WMS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN# = "Y"
:          SET &CONN_UPDATE_FAILOVER# = "Y"
:          SET &CONN_PARAMETERS_FAILOVER# = "'&WMS_DB_VIP_PRI#' '&WMS_DB_PORT#' '&WMS_DB_SID#'"
:        ENDIF
:      ENDIF
:    ENDIF
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:PUBLISH &CONN_UPDATE_PRIMARY#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &CONN_UPDATE_FAILOVER#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &CONN_PARAMETERS_PRIMARY#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &CONN_PARAMETERS_FAILOVER#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &DG_SWITCH_PRIMARY#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &DG_SWITCH_FAILOVER#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &DG_SWITCH_PARAMETERS#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SWITCH_DATABASE#,,WORKFLOW
